general.description: This independant station is the entry point for the dangerous Delta Sector. In the past, it had a protection contract with the Wurth Interstellar Concern. When it was revealed the Concern used this contract to cover up preparation for creating a new state along with local mafias, the contract was replaced by a force made up of independant mercenary squadrons.
general.bar: Fighter pilots and traders, mainly Humans, but some RIthai and Sshaads.
